definitions.text: the edge of a piece of cloth; especially the finished edge that has been doubled under and stitched down
examples: the hem of her dress was stained
he stitched weights into the curtain's hem
it seeped along the hem of his jacket

definitions.text: the utterance of a sound similar to clearing the throat; intended to get attention, express hesitancy, fill a pause, hide embarrassment, warn a friend, etc.
fold over and sew together to provide with a hem
